data.partBlankContent: The command line and graphical user interface are two different ways a user can communicate instructions to the computer. For exa____, y__ can lau___ an appli______ through t__ command li__ by typ___ in t__ command ( path t_ where t__ program i_ installed ) to op__ the appli______. Graphical user interface allows the user to physically search for the program via mouse click to open the application.
data.fullContent: The command line and graphical user interface are two different ways a user can communicate instructions to the computer. For example, you can launch an application through the command line by typing in the command ( path to where the program is installed ) to open the application. Graphical user interface allows the user to physically search for the program via mouse click to open the application.
data.answer: 命令行和图形用户界面是用户向计算机传递指令的两种不同方式。例如，您可以通过命令行输入命令(程序安装位置的路径)来打开应用程序，从而启动应用程序。图形用户界面允许用户通过鼠标点击实际搜索程序来打开应用程序。
